d:
Chapter One of “Barsi/Celestin” — a tale of power, submission, and blurred lines.

During a weekend birthday party at a remote country house, Nicolás — a stylish, confident salesman in his thirties — tries to rekindle an old flame with his ex-lover, Sandra. But Sandra doesn’t come alone. She arrives with Claire, her bold, assertive girlfriend.

Both women are dominant and unapologetically into BDSM. What begins as playful teasing soon turns cruel. In full view of the party’s social undercurrents, they seduce, arouse, and humiliate Nicolás — leaving him flushed, broken, and stained with his own shame.

But Nicolás isn’t ready to surrender. Bruised ego and all, he plots a return — a business trip turned battlefield — hoping to take back control from the women who toppled his masculine pride.

What begins as a seductive reunion spirals into a ferocious threesome… and then, something darker. In this game, power shifts like shadows — and no one gets out unchanged.
